title: The Kerslake Arena Review
description_short: The Kerslake Arena Review was an independent review into the preparedness and emergency response to the Manchester Arena attack commissioned by Greater Manchester Mayor Andy Burnham.
description_long: The Kerslake Arena Review was an independent review into the preparedness and emergency response to the Manchester Arena attack commissioned by Greater Manchester Mayor Andy Burnham. Chaired by Bob Kerslake, the review published its final report in 2018.
